body.name: iPhone Charger [Apple MFi Certified] 5pack 10FT Long Lightning Cable Fast Charging High Speed Data Sync iPhone Charger Cord Compatible iPhone 14/13/12/11 Pro Max/XS MAX/XR/XS/X/8/7/Plus iPad (White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 57 mins
features: MFi Certified: Apple MFi certified Lightning Cable is guaranteed no pop up warning messages, ensuring your Lightning devices charge safely and quickly at the fastest possible speed.

Safe iPhone Charger Fast Charging: iPhone charger cable is made of high purity copper core and intelligent smart chip with overcharge protection, current stabilization protection, automaticly switching and battery protection, which can support up to 2.4A fast charging and 480 Mbps transmission speed.

Wide Compatibility: iPhone charger cable MFi certified is compatible with iPhone 14/13/12/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS/XS Max/XR/X/8 Plus/8/7 Plus/7/6s Plus/6s/6 Plus/6/5s/5c/5/Air 2/ mini/mini 2/mini 4 etc.
What You Get: MFi certified 5 pack iPhone charging cables, 10 feet in length, convenient to charge your device in bedroom, sofa, office, travel, even if you are sitting in the back seat of your car.
Our After-sale Service: If you have any questions about the product, please feel free to contact us. Our service team will provide you with a satisfactory solution within 24 hours.
body.description: Today's brand "Estbuc" has grown into a leading brand in the iphone charger industry. Hundreds of millions of fans love and high-quality cables have made today's Brilliant! High Quality Lightning Cable: The Estbuc cables have great resistance to heat and corrosion. Even after using the cable for a long amount of time, the cables keep their original appearance. They look brand new and fashionable even after being used! Fast Charge & Data Transmission Capability: The compact tipped connections allow for the best possible conductivity and connection for a fast data transfer and charge. The connector fits easily and securely into your device, while also fitting most cases. The Perfect Lengths for all Occasions: The Estbuc lightning cable is ideal for many different occasions. For Example, you can keep using your devices while charging in your bedroom, kitchen, and even in the backseat of your car! This cable will provide you with a comfortable and convenient experience with no more of those annoying messages saying your device is not charging. No more constant reminders on the phone screen telling you the frustrating truth, that the cable you are using cannot charge your favorite device. Compatibility: −iPhone 14/13/12/11/ Pro/Max/iPhone Xs/Max/XR/X/8/8 Plus −iPhone 7/ 7 Plus / 6s Plus / 6s / 6 Plus −iPhone 5s / 5c / 5 / SE −iPad Pro / iPad Air / Air 2 −iPad mini 2 / mini 3 / mini 4 −iPad 4th gen − iPod Touch 5th gen / iPod Nano 7th gen and Beats Pill+ User Tips : Make sure the charger output does not exceed 5V/2A when your phone is charged. This will provide protection for your phone while it is charging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are GREAT!
reviews.reviewText: Tired of iPhone charging cables that are too short? Buy these! I love that these are so long and so far they have worked perfectly. I'm using two in different rooms in my house, and I put one in my car to have an extra charger for passengers. Note that these are JUST the cables - they don't come with electrical plugs. For me, that's no problem - on my desk, I plug into a USB plug on my desk; and I just use a plug I already had, in my bedroom. I think these are the best deal for the money on Amazon. I recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great charging cords!
reviews.reviewText: Got these charging cords to replace my existing cord that stopped working. These are exactly what I was looking for- 10ft long, white, seem durable, and are a great value. Gave one to each of our family members so they can charge while they look at their phone in bed. Everyone said they work like a charm. Would definitely buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 long cables mean less moving and more cable life
reviews.reviewText: With 5 of these at 10 feet each, we will never have to extend or stretch our lightning cables anymore. We also will not have to keep transferring cables from one room to another. All of that means the cables will last longer and not have the fire risks associated with cables cracking and shorting out due to abuse or overhandling. So far, these cables are working properly and not getting heated like some longer cables we've had in the past. Charging rate is about the same as our original iPad USB to Lighting cables, which is excellent. Hope they last a long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, lengthy and lasts a decent amount of time.
reviews.reviewText: We’re heavily invested in the Apple ecosystem so we go though power cords like crazy. We’ve got a dozen all over the house.These are very long so we can lay in bed or sit at a table while using/charging our devices. They last a decent amount of time and to date, have not come apart and left that little horseshoe piece of metal inside the receptacle of the phone or iPad that then prevents another cable from plugging in. I really hate the form factor of these plugs but these cable work well without causing problem for tech support (me…)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The iphone charging cables use high-quality four-core copper wires to improve charging and data transfer speed of your phone. The cord has a built-in MFi Certified Chipset which allows for quicker charging while keeping your smartphone entirely secure. After of three months of using this product I seen dramatic difference in the charger time compared to my old charger. With my old charger it use to take 1-2 hours for it charge, with the Estbuc iphone Charger my cell phone is charge in 20 minutes or less. I work a busy schedule and need my phone 24/7 and having this type of charger allows me to a have the service I need to do my job. I strongly recommend someone who is looking a fast charger to invest in this one you will be pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: In our family we all have iPhones … good charger are so important, especially for my kids who let their phones practically go to 3% on the daily. These charges are fast, reliable and stand the test of time. Extremely happy with this purchase. The long cord let’s you have your phone even at night with the alarm set because the 10 feet length allows for it. The price was amazing and 5 chargers are definitely a sufficient and a perfect amount, even for kids that lose them often. Always a back up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good quality, the extra length of the cords is convenient

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for price
reviews.reviewText: These chargers are the perfect length. My son has a bunk bed and he can plug it in and it reaches the top of his bunk. They last a good while but not as long as an Apple charger.
